overview: The Earth hides extraordinary secrets in every forest and desert. Starting high above the vast wilderness of Yellowstone, explore ancient geysers revealing brilliant colors and intriguing clues to our past. Then travel to the Amazon rainforest and see how remarkable species have made astonishing adaptations just to survive. Visit the Everglades, the incredible ecological treasure in Florida, and also see the immense Chinese desert, the wild forests of Haiti, and peaceful yet potentially violent San Andreas fault. All of these natural wonders face challenges, but with the help of dedicated environmental workers, this program makes the case that the beauty of the Earth can be preserved.
title: Earth From Above: Amazing Lands
